articles.description: Khalil Ahmad had 31 points and Kyle Allman added 21 and Cal State Fullerton made five free throws down the stretch to seal a 68-66 win over UC Davis on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Cal State Fullerton holds off UC Davis for 68-66 win

articles.description: Tyree Appleby and Stefan Kenic converted 7 of 8 from the free-throw line in the final two minutes and Chicago State held on to upset Illinois-Chicago, 86-78 in a Horizon League game Saturday night.
articles.headline: Cleveland State holds off UIC late to post 86-78 upset win

articles.description: The Aggies finish with four players in double figures and move to 6-6 in conference play.
articles.headline: Texas A&M slides past No. 24 Kentucky 85-74

images.caption: The Aggies finish with four players in double figures and move to 6-6 in conference play.
images.name: Texas A&M slides past No. 24 Kentucky 85-74

articles.description: Senior Daryl Macon joins SEC Now to discuss his 21-point game vs. Vanderbilt and how the team is focusing on defense to find success.
articles.headline: Hogs improving with defensive mindset

images.caption: Senior Daryl Macon joins SEC Now to discuss his 21-point game vs. Vanderbilt and how the team is focusing on defense to find success.
images.name: Hogs improving with defensive mindset

articles.description: Alex Thompson and Demetrius Denzel-Dyson combined to score 44 points as Samford shot better than 67 percent from the field to fly past The Citadel, 116-103 in a Southern Conference game on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Hot-shooting Samford blows past The Citadel, 116-103

articles.description: Daryl Macon scored at least 20 points for a seventh straight game to help Arkansas get back to .500 in the Southeastern Conference with a 72-54 win over Vanderbilt on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Macon tops 20-point mark again in Arkansas win over Vandy
